title: The Network
description: [Alternate cover edition for ASIN: B00C1KX9T6]There are underground networks that exist to help battered women escape abusive relationships. June Sandowski lives in fear of her husband and his criminal associates, until one horrific night when she must flee with her two sons. The family escapes into the women’s networks, only to find themselves sought for murder and forced to make take drastic measures—her sons must become her daughters to avoid the police. With new identities the family attempts a fresh start as the boys struggle with girlhood, and learning about being transgender.
author: Karin Bishop
